version_description:
iOS10 supported.
Change the image size from the widget.

+ Added Feature +
You can take picture directly from the app.
You can copy photos in the app to the camera roll.

Thank you.

- Feature Update.
Added setting that can change widget's maximum size.
You can select Midium or Max.
Updated to support iPhone X and new photo format (HEIC).

Support the Dark mode.
Photos that could not be imported by the app should be able to be imported.

- This is an internal fix for iOS 14 widget. There is no change in behavior.
The key value for updating the widget may not be unique, so this has been fixed.

I tried to fix the problem that the image is not displayed on some models. I hope it will be fixed.
Added and modified store screenshots.

Thanks.

This is a bug fix for the widget. I reviewed the part that reads the image.
I hope it has been improved.
The preview when placing the widget is now an icon image.

Thanks.
